Warning

OS/2

version

OS/2 table version should be 4.

OS/2 table version is '3' but should be 4. Please verify agains job spec.

Error

Verdana Pro Light Regular (VerdanaPro-Light.ttf)

post

format

If not CFF, post table format should be 2.

Post table format is 3.0 but should be 2 (except for CJK fonts). Please investigate.
More infos here:
https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/typography/opentype/spec/post

Verdana Pro Light Italic (VerdanaPro-LightItalic.ttf)

name, Italic

MS NID 2

MS ID 2 is 'Italic'. Please verify if flags are set correctly.

ID 2 is 'Italic'
OS2.fsSelection.regular is 'False'
OS2.fsSelection.bold is 'False'
head.macStyle.bold is 'False'

Pass

Verdana Pro Light Italic (VerdanaPro-LightItalic.ttf)

OS/2

italic flag

'OS/2' fsSelection italic flag should be set.

'OS/2' fsSelection italic flag is: 'True'.

Pass

head

'head' macStyle italic flag is: 'True'.

Verdana Pro SemiBold Regular (VerdanaPro-SemiBold.ttf)

-/-

Verdana Pro Light Regular (VerdanaPro-Light.ttf)

hmtx

Advance

ZERO WIDTH NO-BREAK SPACE advance width should be 0

Advance width is '0'

Pass

Verdana Pro Light Regular (VerdanaPro-Light.ttf)

cmap

00AD

Soft hyphen 00AD in cmap table.

Soft hyphen is often used in web and in professional print publishing software like Adobe InDesign.

Pass

Verdana Pro Light Regular (VerdanaPro-Light.ttf)

OK: Advance width nonbreakingspace (uni00A0) does match the space (uni0020) width:
730 = 730

CANNOT check double NULL names. Format 3.0 post table.

Info

Advance width of 'SIX-PER-EM SPACE' (uni2006) should be 1/6 of em-square.

Can not check, because no uni2006 in this font.

Info

Verdana Pro Black Italic (VerdanaPro-BlackItalic.ttf)

cmap

uni2002

Advance width of 'EN SPACE' (uni2002) should be 50%% of em-square.

Can not check, because no uni2002 in this font.

Info

Verdana Pro Black Italic (VerdanaPro-BlackItalic.ttf)

cmap

uni2003

Advance width of 'EM SPACE' (uni2003) should be equal to UPM.

Can not check, because no uni2003 in this font.

Info

Verdana Pro Black Italic (VerdanaPro-BlackItalic.ttf)

cmap

uni2008

Advance width of 'PUNCTUATION SPACE' (uni2008) should be equal to the 'period' advance width.

Can not check, because no uni2008 in this font.

Nodes Close to Zones (CFF)

Nodes Close to Zones (CFF)

Info

Verdana Pro Light Regular (VerdanaPro-Light.ttf)

CFF

Alignment Zones

Check if nodes are close to a zone, but not in or touching it.

This is a TTF, but this test is only for CFF fonts.

Verdana Pro Light Regular (VerdanaPro-Light.ttf)

OS/2

table version 3.

'OS/2' table version should be 4.

'OS/2' table version is: 3. Verify that this is the version required.

Pass

Verdana Pro Light Regular (VerdanaPro-Light.ttf)

OS/2

italic flag

'OS/2' fsSelection italic flag should match the 'head' macStyle italic flag. They should be the same.

OK: They are the same.'OS/2' fsSelection italic flag is False and 'head' macStyle italic flag is False.

Pass

Verdana Pro Light Regular (VerdanaPro-Light.ttf)

OS/2

Panose Normal

Because 'OS/2' fsSelection italic flag is False and 'head' macStyle italic flag is False the OS/2 panose array form flag should be a 'Normal' entry.

OK: 'OS/2' panose array form flag is a 'Normal' entry.

Pass

Verdana Pro Light Regular (VerdanaPro-Light.ttf)

OS/2

usBreakChar

'OS/2' usBreakChar should be 0x0020.

OK: 'OS/2' usBreakChar is 0x0020.

Pass

Verdana Pro Light Regular (VerdanaPro-Light.ttf)

OK: 'OS/2' usDefaultChar is 0x0000.

Embedding Level is 'Embedding Level = Editable Embedding'. If custom font please check against job spec.

OS/2

'OS/2' usBreakChar should be 0x0020.

OK: 'OS/2' usBreakChar is 0x0020.

Pass

OS/2

'OS/2' usDefaultChar should be 0x0000.

OK: 'OS/2' usDefaultChar is 0x0000.

Error

Verdana Pro Bold (VerdanaPro-Bold.ttf)

OS/2

Embedding Level

For library fonts embedding level should be 'Preview & Print Embedding'.

Embedding Level is 'Embedding Level = Editable Embedding'. If custom font please check against job spec.

Info

embedding level: Embedding Level = Editable Embedding
no subsetting flag: False

Verdana Pro Bold Italic (VerdanaPro-BoldItalic.ttf)

OS/2

table version 3.

'OS/2' table version should be 4.

'OS/2' table version is: 3. Verify that this is the version required.

Pass

Verdana Pro Bold Italic (VerdanaPro-BoldItalic.ttf)

OS/2

usWeightClass

OS/2 usWeightClass should be 700 if NID 2 contains 'Bold'.

'OS/2' table usWeightClass is 700.

Pass

Verdana Pro Bold Italic (VerdanaPro-BoldItalic.ttf)

OS/2

italic flag

'OS/2' fsSelection italic flag should match the 'head' macStyle italic flag. They should be the same.

OK: They are the same.'OS/2' fsSelection italic flag is True and 'head' macStyle italic flag is True.

Pass

Verdana Pro Bold Italic (VerdanaPro-BoldItalic.ttf)

OS/2

Panose Italic

Because 'OS/2' fsSelection italic flag is True and 'head' macStyle italic flag is True the OS/2 panose array form flag should be an 'Oblique' entry.

OK: 'OS/2' panose array form flag is an 'Oblique' entry.

Pass

This font is not a variable font.

STAT table

STAT table

Info

Verdana Pro Light Regular (VerdanaPro-Light.ttf)

STAT

static font

Variable font must have a STAT table.

No check of STAT table for static fonts included, yet. Static fonts do not need to have a STAT table. It is only recommended by Microsoft, not required.
More infos here:
https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/typography/opentype/spec/stat

Info

Verdana Pro Light Italic (VerdanaPro-LightItalic.ttf)

static font

cmap

cmap(3, 1, 0)

Missing uni0000 and uni000D in cmap MS/BMP(0,3,0) and Unicode/2.0, BMP only(3,1,0).

cmap(3, 1, 0) contains U+0000

Error

Verdana Pro Light Regular (VerdanaPro-Light.ttf)

cmap

cmap(3, 1, 0)

Missing uni0000 and uni000D in cmap MS/BMP(0,3,0) and Unicode/2.0, BMP only(3,1,0).

Please verify with spec or Project Manager if uni000D is required, if so: PLEASE ADD.

Pass

Name Table

Name Table

Error

Verdana Pro Light Regular (VerdanaPro-Light.ttf)

name

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 0 (0, 3, 0, 0)

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 0 is '© 2017 Microsoft Corporation. All Rights Reserved.'
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Pass

Verdana Pro Light Regular (VerdanaPro-Light.ttf)

name

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 1

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 1, Family Name length shouldn't be longer then 31.

OK: NID 1 length is '17'
'Verdana Pro Light'

Pass

Verdana Pro Light Regular (VerdanaPro-Light.ttf)

name

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 1

Reserved word used in Family Name NID1 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 1 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Regular, Bold, Roman'

Pass

Verdana Pro Light Regular (VerdanaPro-Light.ttf)

name

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 1

Reserved word used in Family Name NID1 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 1 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Regular, Bold, Italic, Extra, Light, Black, Thin, Wide, Ultra'

Pass

Verdana Pro Light Regular (VerdanaPro-Light.ttf)

name

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 1

Should be camel case Family Name NID1

NID 1: OK. No camel case required.

Pass

Verdana Pro Light Regular (VerdanaPro-Light.ttf)

name

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 1

Check style extentions Family Name NID1

NID 1 does not contain any of the following beginnings: 'Dm, Ultra, Extra, Semi, Demi, X, Ex, Xtra, Sm'

Pass

Verdana Pro Light Regular (VerdanaPro-Light.ttf)

name/OS/2

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 1

Width Names Family Name NID1

OS/2 usWidthClass seems to be correct. Cannot find any specific width name in the name:
'Verdana Pro Light'

Pass

Verdana Pro Light Regular (VerdanaPro-Light.ttf)

name

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 6

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '16'
'VerdanaPro-Light'

Pass

Verdana Pro Light Regular (VerdanaPro-Light.ttf)

name

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 6

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'VerdanaPro-Light', Everything looks good.

Pass

Verdana Pro Light Regular (VerdanaPro-Light.ttf)

name

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 6

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'VerdanaPro-Light', Everything looks good.

Pass

Verdana Pro Light Regular (VerdanaPro-Light.ttf)

name

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 6

Error

Verdana Pro Light Regular (VerdanaPro-Light.ttf)

name

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 7

Test Trademark

Current trademark is:
'Verdana is a trademark of the Microsoft group of companies.'
but what do think about this
'Verdana is a trademark of Fontsmith Ltd and may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'

(This is automatically generated and might be wrong. Must be confirmed by legal)

Info

Verdana Pro Light Regular (VerdanaPro-Light.ttf)

name

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 8/13

License text.

There is a license text but no manufactur. Please verify agains spec.
The license text is:
Microsoft supplied font. You may use this font to create, display, and print content as permitted by the license terms or terms of use, of the Microsoft product, service, or content in which this font was included. You may only (i) embed this font in content as permitted by the embedding restrictions included in this font; and (ii) temporarily download this font to a printer or other output device to help print content. Any other use is prohibited.

Pass

Verdana Pro Light Regular (VerdanaPro-Light.ttf)

name

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 16/17

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

NID 16 'Verdana Pro' + 'Space' + NID 17 'Light' = NID 1 'Verdana Pro Light'.

Pass

Mac NID 0 (1, 0, 0, 0)

Please verify agains spec.
Mac NID 0 is '© 2017 Microsoft Corporation. All Rights Reserved.'
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Verdana Pro Light Regular (VerdanaPro-Light.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'VerdanaPro-Light', Everything looks good.

Pass

Verdana Pro Light Regular (VerdanaPro-Light.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8/13

License text if Manufactur (NID 8) is one of these 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited'

Please verify against job spec.
Mac NID 13 is:
Microsoft supplied font. You may use this font to create, display, and print content as permitted by the license terms or terms of use, of the Microsoft product, service, or content in which this font was included. You may only (i) embed this font in content as permitted by the embedding restrictions included in this font; and (ii) temporarily download this font to a printer or other output device to help print content. Any other use is prohibited.
but should be:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Pass

Verdana Pro Light Regular (VerdanaPro-Light.ttf)

name

Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

NID 16 'Verdana Pro' + 'Space' + NID 17 'Light' = NID 1 'Verdana Pro Light'.

OK: MS NID 8 is 'Monotype Imaging Inc.'.

Info

Verdana Pro Light Regular (VerdanaPro-Light.ttf)

name

NID 10 (3, 1, 1033, 10)

'Description' has invalid entry.

Name table entry contains line break, but shouldn't:
'The Verdana™ typeface family was created specifically to address the challenges of on-screen display. Designed by world renowned type designer Matthew Carter, and hand-tuned by leading hinting expert, Tom Rickner, these sans serif fonts are unique examples of type designed for reading on a computer screen.[ ][
][ ][
]Verdana Pro is a major update to the Verdana family. Developed by The Font Bureau, Monotype Imaging and Matthew Carter, Verdana Pro extends the original family of four fonts to 20 fonts in total. The Verdana Pro and Verdana Pro Condensed families each contain 10 fonts: Light, Regular, Semibold, Bold and Black (each with matching italic styles). These enhanced fonts provide typographic flexibility for use in both on screen and in print.[ ][
][ ][
]Verdana Pro includes a variety of advanced typographic features including true small capitals, ligatures, fractions, old style figures, lining tabular figures and lining proportional figures. An OpenType-savvy application is required to access these typographic features. Verdana Pro contains over 800 glyphs with extensive language support including Codepage 1252 Latin 1, Codepage 1250 Latin 2 Eastern Europe, Codepage 1253 Greek, Codepage 1251 Cyrillic, Codepage 1254 Turkish, Codepage 1257 Baltic.'

Error

Verdana Pro Light Regular (VerdanaPro-Light.ttf)

name

MS NID 8/13

License text if Manufactur (NID 8) is one of these 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited'

Please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
Microsoft supplied font. You may use this font to create, display, and print content as permitted by the license terms or terms of use, of the Microsoft product, service, or content in which this font was included. You may only (i) embed this font in content as permitted by the embedding restrictions included in this font; and (ii) temporarily download this font to a printer or other output device to help print content. Any other use is prohibited.
but should be:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Pass

Verdana Pro Light Regular (VerdanaPro-Light.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Pass

Verdana Pro Light Regular (VerdanaPro-Light.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

NID 16 'Verdana Pro' + 'Space' + NID 17 'Light' = NID 1 'Verdana Pro Light'.

Pass

Verdana Pro Light Regular (VerdanaPro-Light.ttf)

name

MS NID 16

Reserved word used in Typographic Family Name NID16 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 16 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

Pass

'Verdana Pro'

Mac is: 'Microsoft supplied font. You may use this font to create, display, and print content as permitted by the license terms or terms of use, of the Microsoft product, service, or content in which this font was included. You may only (i) embed this font in content as permitted by the embedding restrictions included in this font; and (ii) temporarily download this font to a printer or other output device to help print content. Any other use is prohibited.'

You may use this font to create, display, and print content as permitted by the license terms or terms of use, of the Microsoft product, service, or content in which this font was included. You may only (i) embed this font in content as permitted by the embedding restrictions included in this font; and (ii) temporarily download this font to a printer or other output device to help print content. Any other use is prohibited.'

Verdana Pro Light Regular (VerdanaPro-Light.ttf)

Entries are the same.
Mac is: 'Light'
MS is: 'Light'

Error

Verdana Pro Light Regular (VerdanaPro-Light.ttf)

name

Mac and MS NID 10

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are different.
Mac [1, 0, 0] is: 'No entry.'
MS [3, 1, 1033] is: 'The Verdana™ typeface family was created specifically to address the challenges of on-screen display. Designed by world renowned type designer Matthew Carter, and hand-tuned by leading hinting expert, Tom Rickner, these sans serif fonts are unique examples of type designed for reading on a computer screen.

Verdana Pro is a major update to the Verdana family. Developed by The Font Bureau, Monotype Imaging and Matthew Carter, Verdana Pro extends the original family of four fonts to 20 fonts in total. The Verdana Pro and Verdana Pro Condensed families each contain 10 fonts: Light, Regular, Semibold, Bold and Black (each with matching italic styles). These enhanced fonts provide typographic flexibility for use in both on screen and in print.

Verdana Pro includes a variety of advanced typographic features including true small capitals, ligatures, fractions, old style figures, lining tabular figures and lining proportional figures. An OpenType-savvy application is required to access these typographic features. Verdana Pro contains over 800 glyphs with extensive language support including Codepage 1252 Latin 1, Codepage 1250 Latin 2 Eastern Europe, Codepage 1253 Greek, Codepage 1251 Cyrillic, Codepage 1254 Turkish, Codepage 1257 Baltic.'

Pass

Verdana Pro Light Regular (VerdanaPro-Light.ttf)

Family Name is present.

Test Trademark

but what do think about this

Info

Verdana Pro Light Italic (VerdanaPro-LightItalic.ttf)

name

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 8/13

License text.

There is a license text but no manufactur. Please verify agains spec.
The license text is:
Microsoft supplied font. You may use this font to create, display, and print content as permitted by the license terms or terms of use, of the Microsoft product, service, or content in which this font was included. You may only (i) embed this font in content as permitted by the embedding restrictions included in this font; and (ii) temporarily download this font to a printer or other output device to help print content. Any other use is prohibited.

Pass

Verdana Pro Light Italic (VerdanaPro-LightItalic.ttf)

name

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 16/17

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

NID 16 'Verdana Pro' + 'Space' + NID 17 'Light Italic' = NID 1 'Verdana Pro Light' + 'Space' + NID 2 'Italic'.

Pass

, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'VerdanaPro-LightItalic', Everything looks good.

Verdana Pro Light Italic (VerdanaPro-LightItalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8/13

License text if Manufactur (NID 8) is one of these 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited'

Please verify against job spec.
Mac NID 13 is:
Microsoft supplied font. You may use this font to create, display, and print content as permitted by the license terms or terms of use, of the Microsoft product, service, or content in which this font was included. You may only (i) embed this font in content as permitted by the embedding restrictions included in this font; and (ii) temporarily download this font to a printer or other output device to help print content. Any other use is prohibited.
but should be:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Pass

Verdana Pro Light Italic (VerdanaPro-LightItalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 16/17

Mac NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

NID 16 'Verdana Pro' + 'Space' + NID 17 'Light Italic' = NID 1 'Verdana Pro Light' + 'Space' + NID 2 'Italic'.

Verdana Pro Light Italic (VerdanaPro-LightItalic.ttf)

name

NID 10 (3, 1, 1033, 10)

'Description' has invalid entry.

Name table entry contains line break, but shouldn't:
'The Verdana™ typeface family was created specifically to address the challenges of on-screen display. Designed by world renowned type designer Matthew Carter, and hand-tuned by leading hinting expert, Tom Rickner, these sans serif fonts are unique examples of type designed for reading on a computer screen.[ ][
][ ][
]Verdana Pro is a major update to the Verdana family. Developed by The Font Bureau, Monotype Imaging and Matthew Carter, Verdana Pro extends the original family of four fonts to 20 fonts in total. The Verdana Pro and Verdana Pro Condensed families each contain 10 fonts: Light, Regular, Semibold, Bold and Black (each with matching italic styles). These enhanced fonts provide typographic flexibility for use in both on screen and in print.[ ][
][ ][
]Verdana Pro includes a variety of advanced typographic features including true small capitals, ligatures, fractions, old style figures, lining tabular figures and lining proportional figures. An OpenType-savvy application is required to access these typographic features. Verdana Pro contains over 800 glyphs with extensive language support including Codepage 1252 Latin 1, Codepage 1250 Latin 2 Eastern Europe, Codepage 1253 Greek, Codepage 1251 Cyrillic, Codepage 1254 Turkish, Codepage 1257 Baltic.'

Error

Verdana Pro Light Italic (VerdanaPro-LightItalic.ttf)

name

MS NID 8/13

License text if Manufactur (NID 8) is one of these 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited'

Please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
Microsoft supplied font. You may use this font to create, display, and print content as permitted by the license terms or terms of use, of the Microsoft product, service, or content in which this font was included. You may only (i) embed this font in content as permitted by the embedding restrictions included in this font; and (ii) temporarily download this font to a printer or other output device to help print content. Any other use is prohibited.
but should be:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Pass

Verdana Pro Light Italic (VerdanaPro-LightItalic.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Pass

Verdana Pro Light Italic (VerdanaPro-LightItalic.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

NID 16 'Verdana Pro' + 'Space' + NID 17 'Light Italic' = NID 1 'Verdana Pro Light' + 'Space' + NID 2 'Italic'.

Pass

Verdana Pro Light Italic (VerdanaPro-LightItalic.ttf)

name

MS NID 16

Reserved word used in Typographic Family Name NID16 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 16 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

Pass

'Verdana Pro'

Verdana Pro Light Italic (VerdanaPro-LightItalic.ttf)

name

Mac and MS NID 10

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are different.
Mac [1, 0, 0] is: 'No entry.'
MS [3, 1, 1033] is: 'The Verdana™ typeface family was created specifically to address the challenges of on-screen display. Designed by world renowned type designer Matthew Carter, and hand-tuned by leading hinting expert, Tom Rickner, these sans serif fonts are unique examples of type designed for reading on a computer screen.

Verdana Pro is a major update to the Verdana family. Developed by The Font Bureau, Monotype Imaging and Matthew Carter, Verdana Pro extends the original family of four fonts to 20 fonts in total. The Verdana Pro and Verdana Pro Condensed families each contain 10 fonts: Light, Regular, Semibold, Bold and Black (each with matching italic styles). These enhanced fonts provide typographic flexibility for use in both on screen and in print.

Verdana Pro includes a variety of advanced typographic features including true small capitals, ligatures, fractions, old style figures, lining tabular figures and lining proportional figures. An OpenType-savvy application is required to access these typographic features. Verdana Pro contains over 800 glyphs with extensive language support including Codepage 1252 Latin 1, Codepage 1250 Latin 2 Eastern Europe, Codepage 1253 Greek, Codepage 1251 Cyrillic, Codepage 1254 Turkish, Codepage 1257 Baltic.'

Pass

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 0 (0, 3, 0, 0)

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 0 is '© 2017 Microsoft Corporation. All Rights Reserved.'
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Verdana Pro Regular (VerdanaPro-Regular.ttf)

name/head

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 5

name table version should match head table fontRevision.

OK: name table version entry 'Version 6.13;O365' does match fontRevision 'Version 6.13'.

Pass

Verdana Pro Regular (VerdanaPro-Regular.ttf)

name

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 6

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '10'
'VerdanaPro'

Pass

Verdana Pro Regular (VerdanaPro-Regular.ttf)

name

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 6

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'VerdanaPro', Everything looks good.

Pass

Verdana Pro Regular (VerdanaPro-Regular.ttf)

name

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 6

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'VerdanaPro', Everything looks good.

Pass

Verdana Pro Regular (VerdanaPro-Regular.ttf)

name

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 6

Reserved word used in PostScript Name NID6 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 6 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

Error

Verdana Pro Regular (VerdanaPro-Regular.ttf)

name

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 7

Test Trademark

Current trademark is:
'Verdana is a trademark of the Microsoft group of companies.'
but what do think about this
'Verdana is a trademark of Fontsmith Ltd and may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'

(This is automatically generated and might be wrong. Must be confirmed by legal)

Info

Verdana Pro Regular (VerdanaPro-Regular.ttf)

name

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 8/13

License text.

There is a license text but no manufactur. Please verify agains spec.
The license text is:
Microsoft supplied font. You may use this font to create, display, and print content as permitted by the license terms or terms of use, of the Microsoft product, service, or content in which this font was included. You may only (i) embed this font in content as permitted by the embedding restrictions included in this font; and (ii) temporarily download this font to a printer or other output device to help print content. Any other use is prohibited.

Pass

Verdana Pro Regular (VerdanaPro-Regular.ttf)

name

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 16/17

If NID 2 and 17 = 'Regular': !! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 16 should match NID 1.
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). This is true for MS Office Version 1639 and lower. Even though Microsoft has changed it with version 1640 (fast insider, June 2020) we keep this as an error, because most of the current MS Office users won't update in the near future. More infos here:
Cross Platform Issues

NID 16 'Verdana Pro' = NID 1 'Verdana Pro'.

Pass

Verdana Pro Regular (VerdanaPro-Regular.ttf)

name

Reserved word used in Typographic Family Name NID16 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 16 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

Pass

It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Verdana Pro Regular (VerdanaPro-Regular.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8/13

License text if Manufactur (NID 8) is one of these 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited'

Please verify against job spec.
Mac NID 13 is:
Microsoft supplied font. You may use this font to create, display, and print content as permitted by the license terms or terms of use, of the Microsoft product, service, or content in which this font was included. You may only (i) embed this font in content as permitted by the embedding restrictions included in this font; and (ii) temporarily download this font to a printer or other output device to help print content. Any other use is prohibited.
but should be:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Pass

Verdana Pro Regular (VerdanaPro-Regular.ttf)

name

Mac NID 16/17

If NID 2 and 17 = 'Regular': Mac NID 16 should match NID 1.
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). This is true for MS Office Version 1639 and lower. Even though Microsoft has changed it with version 1640 (fast insider, June 2020) we keep this as an error, because most of the current MS Office users won't update in the near future. More infos here:
Cross Platform Issues

NID 16 'Verdana Pro' = NID 1 'Verdana Pro'.

Pass

Verdana Pro Regular (VerdanaPro-Regular.ttf)

name

NID 10 (3, 1, 1033, 10)

'Description' has invalid entry.

Name table entry contains line break, but shouldn't:
'The Verdana™ typeface family was created specifically to address the challenges of on-screen display. Designed by world renowned type designer Matthew Carter, and hand-tuned by leading hinting expert, Tom Rickner, these sans serif fonts are unique examples of type designed for reading on a computer screen.[ ][
][ ][
]Verdana Pro is a major update to the Verdana family. Developed by The Font Bureau, Monotype Imaging and Matthew Carter, Verdana Pro extends the original family of four fonts to 20 fonts in total. The Verdana Pro and Verdana Pro Condensed families each contain 10 fonts: Light, Regular, Semibold, Bold and Black (each with matching italic styles). These enhanced fonts provide typographic flexibility for use in both on screen and in print.[ ][
][ ][
]Verdana Pro includes a variety of advanced typographic features including true small capitals, ligatures, fractions, old style figures, lining tabular figures and lining proportional figures. An OpenType-savvy application is required to access these typographic features. Verdana Pro contains over 800 glyphs with extensive language support including Codepage 1252 Latin 1, Codepage 1250 Latin 2 Eastern Europe, Codepage 1253 Greek, Codepage 1251 Cyrillic, Codepage 1254 Turkish, Codepage 1257 Baltic.'

Error

Verdana Pro Regular (VerdanaPro-Regular.ttf)

name

MS NID 8/13

License text if Manufactur (NID 8) is one of these 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited'

Please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
Microsoft supplied font. You may use this font to create, display, and print content as permitted by the license terms or terms of use, of the Microsoft product, service, or content in which this font was included. You may only (i) embed this font in content as permitted by the embedding restrictions included in this font; and (ii) temporarily download this font to a printer or other output device to help print content. Any other use is prohibited.
but should be:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Pass

Verdana Pro Regular (VerdanaPro-Regular.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Pass

Verdana Pro Regular (VerdanaPro-Regular.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If NID 2 and 17 = 'Regular': MS NID 16 should match NID 1.
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). This is true for MS Office Version 1639 and lower. Even though Microsoft has changed it with version 1640 (fast insider, June 2020) we keep this as an error, because most of the current MS Office users won't update in the near future. More infos here:
Cross Platform Issues

NID 16 'Verdana Pro' = NID 1 'Verdana Pro'.

Verdana Pro Regular (VerdanaPro-Regular.ttf)

name

MS NID 16

Reserved word used in Typographic Family Name NID16 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 16 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Roman'

Pass

Verdana Pro Regular (VerdanaPro-Regular.ttf)

'Verdana Pro'

Verdana Pro Regular (VerdanaPro-Regular.ttf)

name

Mac and MS NID 0

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are the same.
Mac is: '© 2017 Microsoft Corporation. All Rights Reserved.'
MS is: '© 2017 Microsoft Corporation. All Rights Reserved.'

Pass

Mac is: 'Verdana Pro'
MS is: 'Verdana Pro'

Verdana Pro Regular (VerdanaPro-Regular.ttf)

name

Mac and MS NID 13

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are the same.
Mac is: 'Microsoft supplied font. You may use this font to create, display, and print content as permitted by the license terms or terms of use, of the Microsoft product, service, or content in which this font was included. You may only (i) embed this font in content as permitted by the embedding restrictions included in this font; and (ii) temporarily download this font to a printer or other output device to help print content. Any other use is prohibited.'
MS is: 'Microsoft supplied font. You may use this font to create, display, and print content as permitted by the license terms or terms of use, of the Microsoft product, service, or content in which this font was included. You may only (i) embed this font in content as permitted by the embedding restrictions included in this font; and (ii) temporarily download this font to a printer or other output device to help print content. Any other use is prohibited.'

Pass

Verdana Pro Regular (VerdanaPro-Regular.ttf)

name

Mac and MS NID 10

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are different.
Mac [1, 0, 0] is: 'No entry.'
MS [3, 1, 1033] is: 'The Verdana™ typeface family was created specifically to address the challenges of on-screen display. Designed by world renowned type designer Matthew Carter, and hand-tuned by leading hinting expert, Tom Rickner, these sans serif fonts are unique examples of type designed for reading on a computer screen.

Verdana Pro is a major update to the Verdana family. Developed by The Font Bureau, Monotype Imaging and Matthew Carter, Verdana Pro extends the original family of four fonts to 20 fonts in total. The Verdana Pro and Verdana Pro Condensed families each contain 10 fonts: Light, Regular, Semibold, Bold and Black (each with matching italic styles). These enhanced fonts provide typographic flexibility for use in both on screen and in print.

Verdana Pro includes a variety of advanced typographic features including true small capitals, ligatures, fractions, old style figures, lining tabular figures and lining proportional figures. An OpenType-savvy application is required to access these typographic features. Verdana Pro contains over 800 glyphs with extensive language support including Codepage 1252 Latin 1, Codepage 1250 Latin 2 Eastern Europe, Codepage 1253 Greek, Codepage 1251 Cyrillic, Codepage 1254 Turkish, Codepage 1257 Baltic.'

Pass

Verdana Pro Regular (VerdanaPro-Regular.ttf)

Verdana Pro Italic (VerdanaPro-Italic.ttf)

name

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 0 (0, 3, 0, 0)

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 0 is '© 2017 Microsoft Corporation. All Rights Reserved.'
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Pass

OK: NID 1 length is '11'
'Verdana Pro'

Verdana Pro Italic (VerdanaPro-Italic.ttf)

name

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 6

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '17'
'VerdanaPro-Italic'

Pass

Verdana Pro Italic (VerdanaPro-Italic.ttf)

name

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 6

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'VerdanaPro-Italic', Everything looks good.

Pass

Verdana Pro Italic (VerdanaPro-Italic.ttf)

name

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 6

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'VerdanaPro-Italic', Everything looks good.

Pass

Verdana Pro Italic (VerdanaPro-Italic.ttf)

name

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 7

Test Trademark

Current trademark is:
'Verdana is a trademark of the Microsoft group of companies.'
but what do think about this
'Verdana is a trademark of Fontsmith Ltd and may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'

(This is automatically generated and might be wrong. Must be confirmed by legal)

Info

Verdana Pro Italic (VerdanaPro-Italic.ttf)

name

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 8/13

License text.

There is a license text but no manufactur. Please verify agains spec.
The license text is:
Microsoft supplied font. You may use this font to create, display, and print content as permitted by the license terms or terms of use, of the Microsoft product, service, or content in which this font was included. You may only (i) embed this font in content as permitted by the embedding restrictions included in this font; and (ii) temporarily download this font to a printer or other output device to help print content. Any other use is prohibited.

Pass

Verdana Pro Italic (VerdanaPro-Italic.ttf)

name

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 16/17

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

NID 16 'Verdana Pro' + 'Space' + NID 17 'Italic' = NID 1 'Verdana Pro' + 'Space' + NID 2 'Italic'.

Pass

Verdana Pro Italic (VerdanaPro-Italic.ttf)

name

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 16

Reserved word used in Typographic Family Name NID16 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 16 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

Pass

Verdana Pro Italic (VerdanaPro-Italic.ttf)

name

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 16

Reserved word used in Typographic Family Name NID16 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 16 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Roman'

Pass

Verdana Pro Italic (VerdanaPro-Italic.ttf)

name

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 16

Reserved word used in Typographic Family Name NID16 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 16 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Regular, Bold, Italic, Extra, Light, Black, Thin, Wide, Ultra'

Pass

Verdana Pro Italic (VerdanaPro-Italic.ttf)

name/OS/2

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 16

Width Names Typographic Family Name NID16

OS/2 usWidthClass seems to be correct. Cannot find any specific width name in the name:
'Verdana Pro'

Pass

Verdana Pro Italic (VerdanaPro-Italic.ttf)

name

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 17

Reserved word used in Typographic Subfamily Name NID17 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 17 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

name

Reserved word used in Typographic Subfamily Name NID17 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 17 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Roman'

Pass

Verdana Pro Italic (VerdanaPro-Italic.ttf)

name

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 17

Should be camel case Typographic Subfamily Name NID17

NID 17: OK. No camel case required.

Pass

Verdana Pro Italic (VerdanaPro-Italic.ttf)

name

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 17

Check style extentions Typographic Subfamily Name NID17

NID 17 does not contain any of the following beginnings: 'Dm, Ultra, Extra, Semi, Demi, X, Ex, Xtra, Sm'

Pass

name/OS/2

'Italic'

Verdana Pro Italic (VerdanaPro-Italic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 0 (1, 0, 0, 0)

Mac NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
Mac NID 0 is '© 2017 Microsoft Corporation. All Rights Reserved.'
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Pass

'Verdana Pro'

name

Mac NID 1

Should be camel case Family Name NID1

NID 1: OK. No camel case required.

name

NID 1 does not contain any of the following beginnings: 'Dm, Ultra, Extra, Semi, Demi, X, Ex, Xtra, Sm'

'Verdana Pro'

Verdana Pro Italic (VerdanaPro-Italic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '17'
'VerdanaPro-Italic'

Pass

Verdana Pro Italic (VerdanaPro-Italic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'VerdanaPro-Italic', Everything looks good.

Pass

Verdana Pro Italic (VerdanaPro-Italic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'VerdanaPro-Italic', Everything looks good.

Pass

Verdana Pro Italic (VerdanaPro-Italic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Reserved word used in PostScript Name NID6 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 6 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

Verdana Pro Italic (VerdanaPro-Italic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 7

Test Trademark

Current trademark is:
'Verdana is a trademark of the Microsoft group of companies.'
but what do think about this
'Verdana is a trademark of Fontsmith Ltd and may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'

(This is automatically generated and might be wrong. Must be confirmed by legal)

Pass

Verdana Pro Italic (VerdanaPro-Italic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8

Manufactur (NID 8) should be Monotype IP

OK: Mac NID 8 is 'Monotype Imaging Inc.'.

Error

Verdana Pro Italic (VerdanaPro-Italic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8/13

License text if Manufactur (NID 8) is one of these 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited'

Please verify against job spec.
Mac NID 13 is:
Microsoft supplied font. You may use this font to create, display, and print content as permitted by the license terms or terms of use, of the Microsoft product, service, or content in which this font was included. You may only (i) embed this font in content as permitted by the embedding restrictions included in this font; and (ii) temporarily download this font to a printer or other output device to help print content. Any other use is prohibited.
but should be:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Pass

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'VerdanaPro-Italic', Everything looks good.

Info

Verdana Pro Italic (VerdanaPro-Italic.ttf)

name

NID 10 (3, 1, 1033, 10)

'Description' has invalid entry.

Name table entry contains line break, but shouldn't:
'The Verdana™ typeface family was created specifically to address the challenges of on-screen display. Designed by world renowned type designer Matthew Carter, and hand-tuned by leading hinting expert, Tom Rickner, these sans serif fonts are unique examples of type designed for reading on a computer screen.[ ][
][ ][
]Verdana Pro is a major update to the Verdana family. Developed by The Font Bureau, Monotype Imaging and Matthew Carter, Verdana Pro extends the original family of four fonts to 20 fonts in total. The Verdana Pro and Verdana Pro Condensed families each contain 10 fonts: Light, Regular, Semibold, Bold and Black (each with matching italic styles). These enhanced fonts provide typographic flexibility for use in both on screen and in print.[ ][
][ ][
]Verdana Pro includes a variety of advanced typographic features including true small capitals, ligatures, fractions, old style figures, lining tabular figures and lining proportional figures. An OpenType-savvy application is required to access these typographic features. Verdana Pro contains over 800 glyphs with extensive language support including Codepage 1252 Latin 1, Codepage 1250 Latin 2 Eastern Europe, Codepage 1253 Greek, Codepage 1251 Cyrillic, Codepage 1254 Turkish, Codepage 1257 Baltic.'

Error

Verdana Pro Italic (VerdanaPro-Italic.ttf)

name

MS NID 8/13

License text if Manufactur (NID 8) is one of these 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited'

Please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
Microsoft supplied font. You may use this font to create, display, and print content as permitted by the license terms or terms of use, of the Microsoft product, service, or content in which this font was included. You may only (i) embed this font in content as permitted by the embedding restrictions included in this font; and (ii) temporarily download this font to a printer or other output device to help print content. Any other use is prohibited.
but should be:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Pass

Verdana Pro Italic (VerdanaPro-Italic.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Pass

Verdana Pro Italic (VerdanaPro-Italic.ttf)

name

Mac and MS NID 0

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are the same.
Mac is: '© 2017 Microsoft Corporation. All Rights Reserved.'
MS is: '© 2017 Microsoft Corporation. All Rights Reserved.'

Pass

Verdana Pro Italic (VerdanaPro-Italic.ttf)

name

Mac and MS NID 1

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are the same.
Mac is: 'Verdana Pro'
MS is: 'Verdana Pro'

Pass

Verdana Pro Italic (VerdanaPro-Italic.ttf)

name

Mac and MS NID 13

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are the same.
Mac is: 'Microsoft supplied font. You may use this font to create, display, and print content as permitted by the license terms or terms of use, of the Microsoft product, service, or content in which this font was included. You may only (i) embed this font in content as permitted by the embedding restrictions included in this font; and (ii) temporarily download this font to a printer or other output device to help print content. Any other use is prohibited.'
MS is: 'Microsoft supplied font. You may use this font to create, display, and print content as permitted by the license terms or terms of use, of the Microsoft product, service, or content in which this font was included. You may only (i) embed this font in content as permitted by the embedding restrictions included in this font; and (ii) temporarily download this font to a printer or other output device to help print content. Any other use is prohibited.'

Pass

Verdana Pro Italic (VerdanaPro-Italic.ttf)

name

Mac and MS NID 10

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are different.
Mac [1, 0, 0] is: 'No entry.'
MS [3, 1, 1033] is: 'The Verdana™ typeface family was created specifically to address the challenges of on-screen display. Designed by world renowned type designer Matthew Carter, and hand-tuned by leading hinting expert, Tom Rickner, these sans serif fonts are unique examples of type designed for reading on a computer screen.

Verdana Pro is a major update to the Verdana family. Developed by The Font Bureau, Monotype Imaging and Matthew Carter, Verdana Pro extends the original family of four fonts to 20 fonts in total. The Verdana Pro and Verdana Pro Condensed families each contain 10 fonts: Light, Regular, Semibold, Bold and Black (each with matching italic styles). These enhanced fonts provide typographic flexibility for use in both on screen and in print.

Verdana Pro includes a variety of advanced typographic features including true small capitals, ligatures, fractions, old style figures, lining tabular figures and lining proportional figures. An OpenType-savvy application is required to access these typographic features. Verdana Pro contains over 800 glyphs with extensive language support including Codepage 1252 Latin 1, Codepage 1250 Latin 2 Eastern Europe, Codepage 1253 Greek, Codepage 1251 Cyrillic, Codepage 1254 Turkish, Codepage 1257 Baltic.'

Pass

Verdana Pro Italic (VerdanaPro-Italic.ttf)

name

Family Name is present.

Verdana Pro SemiBold Regular (VerdanaPro-SemiBold.ttf)

name

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 0 (0, 3, 0, 0)

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 0 is '© 2017 Microsoft Corporation. All Rights Reserved.'
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Pass

name

OK: NID 1 length is '20'
'Verdana Pro SemiBold'

Pass

Verdana Pro SemiBold Regular (VerdanaPro-SemiBold.ttf)

name

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 6

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '19'
'VerdanaPro-SemiBold'

Pass

Verdana Pro SemiBold Regular (VerdanaPro-SemiBold.ttf)

name

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 6

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'VerdanaPro-SemiBold', Everything looks good.

Pass

Verdana Pro SemiBold Regular (VerdanaPro-SemiBold.ttf)

name

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 6

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'VerdanaPro-SemiBold', Everything looks good.

Pass

Verdana Pro SemiBold Regular (VerdanaPro-SemiBold.ttf)

Verdana Pro SemiBold Regular (VerdanaPro-SemiBold.ttf)

name

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 7

Test Trademark

Current trademark is:
'Verdana is a trademark of the Microsoft group of companies.'
but what do think about this
'Verdana is a trademark of Fontsmith Ltd and may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'

(This is automatically generated and might be wrong. Must be confirmed by legal)

Info

Verdana Pro SemiBold Regular (VerdanaPro-SemiBold.ttf)

name

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 8/13

License text.

There is a license text but no manufactur. Please verify agains spec.
The license text is:
Microsoft supplied font. You may use this font to create, display, and print content as permitted by the license terms or terms of use, of the Microsoft product, service, or content in which this font was included. You may only (i) embed this font in content as permitted by the embedding restrictions included in this font; and (ii) temporarily download this font to a printer or other output device to help print content. Any other use is prohibited.

Pass

Verdana Pro SemiBold Regular (VerdanaPro-SemiBold.ttf)

name

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 16/17

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

NID 16 'Verdana Pro' + 'Space' + NID 17 'SemiBold' = NID 1 'Verdana Pro SemiBold'.

Pass

Verdana Pro SemiBold Regular (VerdanaPro-SemiBold.ttf)

Verdana Pro SemiBold Regular (VerdanaPro-SemiBold.ttf)

name/OS/2

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 16

Width Names Typographic Family Name NID16

OS/2 usWidthClass seems to be correct. Cannot find any specific width name in the name:
'Verdana Pro'

Pass

Verdana Pro SemiBold Regular (VerdanaPro-SemiBold.ttf)

name

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 17

Reserved word used in Typographic Subfamily Name NID17 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 17 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

Verdana Pro SemiBold Regular (VerdanaPro-SemiBold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 0 (1, 0, 0, 0)

Mac NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
Mac NID 0 is '© 2017 Microsoft Corporation. All Rights Reserved.'
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Pass

Verdana Pro SemiBold Regular (VerdanaPro-SemiBold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.

NID 6 length is '19'
'VerdanaPro-SemiBold'

Pass

Verdana Pro SemiBold Regular (VerdanaPro-SemiBold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'VerdanaPro-SemiBold', Everything looks good.

Pass

Verdana Pro SemiBold Regular (VerdanaPro-SemiBold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'VerdanaPro-SemiBold', Everything looks good.

Pass

Verdana Pro SemiBold Regular (VerdanaPro-SemiBold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 7

Test Trademark

Current trademark is:
'Verdana is a trademark of the Microsoft group of companies.'
but what do think about this
'Verdana is a trademark of Fontsmith Ltd and may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'

(This is automatically generated and might be wrong. Must be confirmed by legal)

Pass

Verdana Pro SemiBold Regular (VerdanaPro-SemiBold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8

Manufactur (NID 8) should be Monotype IP

OK: Mac NID 8 is 'Monotype Imaging Inc.'.

Error

Verdana Pro SemiBold Regular (VerdanaPro-SemiBold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8/13

License text if Manufactur (NID 8) is one of these 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited'

Please verify against job spec.
Mac NID 13 is:
Microsoft supplied font. You may use this font to create, display, and print content as permitted by the license terms or terms of use, of the Microsoft product, service, or content in which this font was included. You may only (i) embed this font in content as permitted by the embedding restrictions included in this font; and (ii) temporarily download this font to a printer or other output device to help print content. Any other use is prohibited.
but should be:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Pass

Verdana Pro SemiBold Regular (VerdanaPro-SemiBold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 16/17

Mac NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

NID 16 'Verdana Pro' + 'Space' + NID 17 'SemiBold' = NID 1 'Verdana Pro SemiBold'.

Pass

Verdana Pro SemiBold Regular (VerdanaPro-SemiBold.ttf)

name

NID 10 (3, 1, 1033, 10)

'Description' has invalid entry.

Name table entry contains line break, but shouldn't:
'The Verdana™ typeface family was created specifically to address the challenges of on-screen display. Designed by world renowned type designer Matthew Carter, and hand-tuned by leading hinting expert, Tom Rickner, these sans serif fonts are unique examples of type designed for reading on a computer screen.[ ][
][ ][
]Verdana Pro is a major update to the Verdana family. Developed by The Font Bureau, Monotype Imaging and Matthew Carter, Verdana Pro extends the original family of four fonts to 20 fonts in total. The Verdana Pro and Verdana Pro Condensed families each contain 10 fonts: Light, Regular, Semibold, Bold and Black (each with matching italic styles). These enhanced fonts provide typographic flexibility for use in both on screen and in print.[ ][
][ ][
]Verdana Pro includes a variety of advanced typographic features including true small capitals, ligatures, fractions, old style figures, lining tabular figures and lining proportional figures. An OpenType-savvy application is required to access these typographic features. Verdana Pro contains over 800 glyphs with extensive language support including Codepage 1252 Latin 1, Codepage 1250 Latin 2 Eastern Europe, Codepage 1253 Greek, Codepage 1251 Cyrillic, Codepage 1254 Turkish, Codepage 1257 Baltic.'

Error

Verdana Pro SemiBold Regular (VerdanaPro-SemiBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 8/13

License text if Manufactur (NID 8) is one of these 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited'

Please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
Microsoft supplied font. You may use this font to create, display, and print content as permitted by the license terms or terms of use, of the Microsoft product, service, or content in which this font was included. You may only (i) embed this font in content as permitted by the embedding restrictions included in this font; and (ii) temporarily download this font to a printer or other output device to help print content. Any other use is prohibited.
but should be:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Pass

Verdana Pro SemiBold Regular (VerdanaPro-SemiBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Pass

name

Mac and MS NID 0

Entries are the same.
Mac is: '© 2017 Microsoft Corporation. All Rights Reserved.'
MS is: '© 2017 Microsoft Corporation. All Rights Reserved.'

Pass

Verdana Pro SemiBold Regular (VerdanaPro-SemiBold.ttf)

name

Mac and MS NID 1

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are the same.
Mac is: 'Verdana Pro SemiBold'
MS is: 'Verdana Pro SemiBold'

Pass

Verdana Pro SemiBold Regular (VerdanaPro-SemiBold.ttf)

name

Mac and MS NID 2

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are the same.
Mac is: 'Regular'
MS is: 'Regular'

Pass

Verdana Pro SemiBold Regular (VerdanaPro-SemiBold.ttf)

name

Mac and MS NID 3

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are the same.
Mac is: 'Microsoft - Verdana Pro SemiBold'
MS is: 'Microsoft - Verdana Pro SemiBold'

Pass

Verdana Pro SemiBold Regular (VerdanaPro-SemiBold.ttf)

name

Mac and MS NID 4

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are the same.
Mac is: 'Verdana Pro SemiBold'
MS is: 'Verdana Pro SemiBold'

Pass

Mac and MS NID 13

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Mac is: 'Microsoft supplied font. You may use this font to create, display, and print content as permitted by the license terms or terms of use, of the Microsoft product, service, or content in which this font was included. You may only (i) embed this font in content as permitted by the embedding restrictions included in this font; and (ii) temporarily download this font to a printer or other output device to help print content. Any other use is prohibited.'
MS is: 'Microsoft supplied font. You may use this font to create, display, and print content as permitted by the license terms or terms of use, of the Microsoft product, service, or content in which this font was included. You may only (i) embed this font in content as permitted by the embedding restrictions included in this font; and (ii) temporarily download this font to a printer or other output device to help print content. Any other use is prohibited.'

Verdana Pro SemiBold Regular (VerdanaPro-SemiBold.ttf)

name

Mac and MS NID 10

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are different.
Mac [1, 0, 0] is: 'No entry.'
MS [3, 1, 1033] is: 'The Verdana™ typeface family was created specifically to address the challenges of on-screen display. Designed by world renowned type designer Matthew Carter, and hand-tuned by leading hinting expert, Tom Rickner, these sans serif fonts are unique examples of type designed for reading on a computer screen.

Verdana Pro is a major update to the Verdana family. Developed by The Font Bureau, Monotype Imaging and Matthew Carter, Verdana Pro extends the original family of four fonts to 20 fonts in total. The Verdana Pro and Verdana Pro Condensed families each contain 10 fonts: Light, Regular, Semibold, Bold and Black (each with matching italic styles). These enhanced fonts provide typographic flexibility for use in both on screen and in print.

Verdana Pro includes a variety of advanced typographic features including true small capitals, ligatures, fractions, old style figures, lining tabular figures and lining proportional figures. An OpenType-savvy application is required to access these typographic features. Verdana Pro contains over 800 glyphs with extensive language support including Codepage 1252 Latin 1, Codepage 1250 Latin 2 Eastern Europe, Codepage 1253 Greek, Codepage 1251 Cyrillic, Codepage 1254 Turkish, Codepage 1257 Baltic.'

Pass

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 0 is '© 2017 Microsoft Corporation. All Rights Reserved.'

Verdana Pro SemiBold Italic (VerdanaPro-SemiBoldItalic.ttf)

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 6

'VerdanaPro-SemiBoldItalic'

Verdana Pro SemiBold Italic (VerdanaPro-SemiBoldItalic.ttf)

name

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 6

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'VerdanaPro-SemiBoldItalic', Everything looks good.

Pass

Verdana Pro SemiBold Italic (VerdanaPro-SemiBoldItalic.ttf)

name

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 6

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'VerdanaPro-SemiBoldItalic', Everything looks good.

Pass

Verdana Pro SemiBold Italic (VerdanaPro-SemiBoldItalic.ttf)

name

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 7

Test Trademark

Current trademark is:
'Verdana is a trademark of the Microsoft group of companies.'
but what do think about this
'Verdana is a trademark of Fontsmith Ltd and may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'

(This is automatically generated and might be wrong. Must be confirmed by legal)

Info

Verdana Pro SemiBold Italic (VerdanaPro-SemiBoldItalic.ttf)

name

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 8/13

License text.

There is a license text but no manufactur. Please verify agains spec.
The license text is:
Microsoft supplied font. You may use this font to create, display, and print content as permitted by the license terms or terms of use, of the Microsoft product, service, or content in which this font was included. You may only (i) embed this font in content as permitted by the embedding restrictions included in this font; and (ii) temporarily download this font to a printer or other output device to help print content. Any other use is prohibited.

Pass

Verdana Pro SemiBold Italic (VerdanaPro-SemiBoldItalic.ttf)

name

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 16/17

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

NID 16 'Verdana Pro' + 'Space' + NID 17 'SemiBold Italic' = NID 1 'Verdana Pro SemiBold' + 'Space' + NID 2 'Italic'.

Pass

Verdana Pro SemiBold Italic (VerdanaPro-SemiBoldItalic.ttf)

NID 16 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

NID 16 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Regular, Bold, Italic, Extra, Light, Black, Thin, Wide, Ultra'

Pass

Verdana Pro SemiBold Italic (VerdanaPro-SemiBoldItalic.ttf)

name/OS/2

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 16

Width Names Typographic Family Name NID16

OS/2 usWidthClass seems to be correct. Cannot find any specific width name in the name:
'Verdana Pro'

Verdana Pro SemiBold Italic (VerdanaPro-SemiBoldItalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'VerdanaPro-SemiBoldItalic', Everything looks good.

Pass

name

'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'VerdanaPro-SemiBoldItalic', Everything looks good.

Pass

Verdana Pro SemiBold Italic (VerdanaPro-SemiBoldItalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8/13

License text if Manufactur (NID 8) is one of these 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited'

Please verify against job spec.
Mac NID 13 is:
Microsoft supplied font. You may use this font to create, display, and print content as permitted by the license terms or terms of use, of the Microsoft product, service, or content in which this font was included. You may only (i) embed this font in content as permitted by the embedding restrictions included in this font; and (ii) temporarily download this font to a printer or other output device to help print content. Any other use is prohibited.
but should be:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Pass

Verdana Pro SemiBold Italic (VerdanaPro-SemiBoldItalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 16/17

Mac NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

NID 16 'Verdana Pro' + 'Space' + NID 17 'SemiBold Italic' = NID 1 'Verdana Pro SemiBold' + 'Space' + NID 2 'Italic'.

Pass

Verdana Pro SemiBold Italic (VerdanaPro-SemiBoldItalic.ttf)

name

NID 10 (3, 1, 1033, 10)

'Description' has invalid entry.

Name table entry contains line break, but shouldn't:
'The Verdana™ typeface family was created specifically to address the challenges of on-screen display. Designed by world renowned type designer Matthew Carter, and hand-tuned by leading hinting expert, Tom Rickner, these sans serif fonts are unique examples of type designed for reading on a computer screen.[ ][
][ ][
]Verdana Pro is a major update to the Verdana family. Developed by The Font Bureau, Monotype Imaging and Matthew Carter, Verdana Pro extends the original family of four fonts to 20 fonts in total. The Verdana Pro and Verdana Pro Condensed families each contain 10 fonts: Light, Regular, Semibold, Bold and Black (each with matching italic styles). These enhanced fonts provide typographic flexibility for use in both on screen and in print.[ ][
][ ][
]Verdana Pro includes a variety of advanced typographic features including true small capitals, ligatures, fractions, old style figures, lining tabular figures and lining proportional figures. An OpenType-savvy application is required to access these typographic features. Verdana Pro contains over 800 glyphs with extensive language support including Codepage 1252 Latin 1, Codepage 1250 Latin 2 Eastern Europe, Codepage 1253 Greek, Codepage 1251 Cyrillic, Codepage 1254 Turkish, Codepage 1257 Baltic.'

Error

Verdana Pro SemiBold Italic (VerdanaPro-SemiBoldItalic.ttf)

name

MS NID 8/13

License text if Manufactur (NID 8) is one of these 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited'

Please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
Microsoft supplied font. You may use this font to create, display, and print content as permitted by the license terms or terms of use, of the Microsoft product, service, or content in which this font was included. You may only (i) embed this font in content as permitted by the embedding restrictions included in this font; and (ii) temporarily download this font to a printer or other output device to help print content. Any other use is prohibited.
but should be:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Pass

Verdana Pro SemiBold Italic (VerdanaPro-SemiBoldItalic.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).
