Verdana Pro SemiBold Italic (VerdanaPro-SemiBoldItalic.ttf)

name

Mac and MS NID 10

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are different.
Mac [1, 0, 0] is: 'No entry.'
MS [3, 1, 1033] is: 'The Verdana™ typeface family was created specifically to address the challenges of on-screen display. Designed by world renowned type designer Matthew Carter, and hand-tuned by leading hinting expert, Tom Rickner, these sans serif fonts are unique examples of type designed for reading on a computer screen.

Verdana Pro is a major update to the Verdana family. Developed by The Font Bureau, Monotype Imaging and Matthew Carter, Verdana Pro extends the original family of four fonts to 20 fonts in total. The Verdana Pro and Verdana Pro Condensed families each contain 10 fonts: Light, Regular, Semibold, Bold and Black (each with matching italic styles). These enhanced fonts provide typographic flexibility for use in both on screen and in print.

Verdana Pro includes a variety of advanced typographic features including true small capitals, ligatures, fractions, old style figures, lining tabular figures and lining proportional figures. An OpenType-savvy application is required to access these typographic features. Verdana Pro contains over 800 glyphs with extensive language support including Codepage 1252 Latin 1, Codepage 1250 Latin 2 Eastern Europe, Codepage 1253 Greek, Codepage 1251 Cyrillic, Codepage 1254 Turkish, Codepage 1257 Baltic.'

Pass

Verdana Pro SemiBold Italic (VerdanaPro-SemiBoldItalic.ttf)

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 0 is '© 2017 Microsoft Corporation. All Rights Reserved.'
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Verdana Pro Bold (VerdanaPro-Bold.ttf)

name

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 6

'VerdanaPro-Bold'

Pass

Verdana Pro Bold (VerdanaPro-Bold.ttf)

name

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 6

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'VerdanaPro-Bold', Everything looks good.

Pass

Verdana Pro Bold (VerdanaPro-Bold.ttf)

name

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 6

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'VerdanaPro-Bold', Everything looks good.

Pass

Verdana Pro Bold (VerdanaPro-Bold.ttf)

name

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 7

Test Trademark

Current trademark is:
'Verdana is a trademark of the Microsoft group of companies.'
but what do think about this
'Verdana is a trademark of Fontsmith Ltd and may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'

(This is automatically generated and might be wrong. Must be confirmed by legal)

Info

Verdana Pro Bold (VerdanaPro-Bold.ttf)

name

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 8/13

License text.

There is a license text but no manufactur. Please verify agains spec.
The license text is:
Microsoft supplied font. You may use this font to create, display, and print content as permitted by the license terms or terms of use, of the Microsoft product, service, or content in which this font was included. You may only (i) embed this font in content as permitted by the embedding restrictions included in this font; and (ii) temporarily download this font to a printer or other output device to help print content. Any other use is prohibited.

Pass

Verdana Pro Bold (VerdanaPro-Bold.ttf)

name

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 16/17

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

NID 16 'Verdana Pro' + 'Space' + NID 17 'Bold' = NID 1 'Verdana Pro' + 'Space' + NID 2 'Bold'.

Pass

Verdana Pro Bold (VerdanaPro-Bold.ttf)

name

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 16

Reserved word used in Typographic Family Name NID16 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 16 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

Pass

Verdana Pro Bold (VerdanaPro-Bold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'VerdanaPro-Bold', Everything looks good.

Pass

Verdana Pro Bold (VerdanaPro-Bold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'VerdanaPro-Bold', Everything looks good.

Pass

name

Mac NID 8/13

Please verify against job spec.
Mac NID 13 is:
Microsoft supplied font. You may use this font to create, display, and print content as permitted by the license terms or terms of use, of the Microsoft product, service, or content in which this font was included. You may only (i) embed this font in content as permitted by the embedding restrictions included in this font; and (ii) temporarily download this font to a printer or other output device to help print content. Any other use is prohibited.
but should be:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Info

Verdana Pro Bold (VerdanaPro-Bold.ttf)

name

NID 10 (3, 1, 1033, 10)

'Description' has invalid entry.

Name table entry contains line break, but shouldn't:
'The Verdana™ typeface family was created specifically to address the challenges of on-screen display. Designed by world renowned type designer Matthew Carter, and hand-tuned by leading hinting expert, Tom Rickner, these sans serif fonts are unique examples of type designed for reading on a computer screen.[ ][
][ ][
]Verdana Pro is a major update to the Verdana family. Developed by The Font Bureau, Monotype Imaging and Matthew Carter, Verdana Pro extends the original family of four fonts to 20 fonts in total. The Verdana Pro and Verdana Pro Condensed families each contain 10 fonts: Light, Regular, Semibold, Bold and Black (each with matching italic styles). These enhanced fonts provide typographic flexibility for use in both on screen and in print.[ ][
][ ][
]Verdana Pro includes a variety of advanced typographic features including true small capitals, ligatures, fractions, old style figures, lining tabular figures and lining proportional figures. An OpenType-savvy application is required to access these typographic features. Verdana Pro contains over 800 glyphs with extensive language support including Codepage 1252 Latin 1, Codepage 1250 Latin 2 Eastern Europe, Codepage 1253 Greek, Codepage 1251 Cyrillic, Codepage 1254 Turkish, Codepage 1257 Baltic.'

Error

Verdana Pro Bold (VerdanaPro-Bold.ttf)

name

MS NID 8/13

License text if Manufactur (NID 8) is one of these 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited'

Please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
Microsoft supplied font. You may use this font to create, display, and print content as permitted by the license terms or terms of use, of the Microsoft product, service, or content in which this font was included. You may only (i) embed this font in content as permitted by the embedding restrictions included in this font; and (ii) temporarily download this font to a printer or other output device to help print content. Any other use is prohibited.
but should be:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Pass

Verdana Pro Bold (VerdanaPro-Bold.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Pass

Mac and MS NID 0

MS is: '© 2017 Microsoft Corporation. All Rights Reserved.'

Verdana Pro Bold (VerdanaPro-Bold.ttf)

name

Mac and MS NID 2

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are the same.
Mac is: 'Bold'
MS is: 'Bold'

Pass

MS is: 'Microsoft - Verdana Pro Bold'

Verdana Pro Bold (VerdanaPro-Bold.ttf)

name

Mac and MS NID 13

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are the same.
Mac is: 'Microsoft supplied font. You may use this font to create, display, and print content as permitted by the license terms or terms of use, of the Microsoft product, service, or content in which this font was included. You may only (i) embed this font in content as permitted by the embedding restrictions included in this font; and (ii) temporarily download this font to a printer or other output device to help print content. Any other use is prohibited.'
MS is: 'Microsoft supplied font. You may use this font to create, display, and print content as permitted by the license terms or terms of use, of the Microsoft product, service, or content in which this font was included. You may only (i) embed this font in content as permitted by the embedding restrictions included in this font; and (ii) temporarily download this font to a printer or other output device to help print content. Any other use is prohibited.'

Pass

Verdana Pro Bold (VerdanaPro-Bold.ttf)

name

Mac and MS NID 10

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are different.
Mac [1, 0, 0] is: 'No entry.'
MS [3, 1, 1033] is: 'The Verdana™ typeface family was created specifically to address the challenges of on-screen display. Designed by world renowned type designer Matthew Carter, and hand-tuned by leading hinting expert, Tom Rickner, these sans serif fonts are unique examples of type designed for reading on a computer screen.

Verdana Pro is a major update to the Verdana family. Developed by The Font Bureau, Monotype Imaging and Matthew Carter, Verdana Pro extends the original family of four fonts to 20 fonts in total. The Verdana Pro and Verdana Pro Condensed families each contain 10 fonts: Light, Regular, Semibold, Bold and Black (each with matching italic styles). These enhanced fonts provide typographic flexibility for use in both on screen and in print.

Verdana Pro includes a variety of advanced typographic features including true small capitals, ligatures, fractions, old style figures, lining tabular figures and lining proportional figures. An OpenType-savvy application is required to access these typographic features. Verdana Pro contains over 800 glyphs with extensive language support including Codepage 1252 Latin 1, Codepage 1250 Latin 2 Eastern Europe, Codepage 1253 Greek, Codepage 1251 Cyrillic, Codepage 1254 Turkish, Codepage 1257 Baltic.'

Pass

Verdana Pro Bold (VerdanaPro-Bold.ttf)

name

Family Name is present.

Verdana Pro Bold Italic (VerdanaPro-BoldItalic.ttf)

name

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 0 (0, 3, 0, 0)

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 0 is '© 2017 Microsoft Corporation. All Rights Reserved.'
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Pass

'Verdana Pro'

Verdana Pro Bold Italic (VerdanaPro-BoldItalic.ttf)

name

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 4

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 4 = NID 1 and NID 2.

NID 4 'Verdana Pro Bold Italic' = NID 1 'Verdana Pro' + 'space' + NID 2 'Bold Italic'

Verdana Pro Bold Italic (VerdanaPro-BoldItalic.ttf)

name

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 6

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '21'
'VerdanaPro-BoldItalic'

Pass

Verdana Pro Bold Italic (VerdanaPro-BoldItalic.ttf)

name

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 6

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'VerdanaPro-BoldItalic', Everything looks good.

Pass

Verdana Pro Bold Italic (VerdanaPro-BoldItalic.ttf)

name

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 6

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'VerdanaPro-BoldItalic', Everything looks good.

Pass

Verdana Pro Bold Italic (VerdanaPro-BoldItalic.ttf)

name

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 7

Test Trademark

Current trademark is:
'Verdana is a trademark of the Microsoft group of companies.'
but what do think about this
'Verdana is a trademark of Fontsmith Ltd and may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'

(This is automatically generated and might be wrong. Must be confirmed by legal)

Info

Verdana Pro Bold Italic (VerdanaPro-BoldItalic.ttf)

name

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 8/13

License text.

There is a license text but no manufactur. Please verify agains spec.
The license text is:
Microsoft supplied font. You may use this font to create, display, and print content as permitted by the license terms or terms of use, of the Microsoft product, service, or content in which this font was included. You may only (i) embed this font in content as permitted by the embedding restrictions included in this font; and (ii) temporarily download this font to a printer or other output device to help print content. Any other use is prohibited.

Pass

Verdana Pro Bold Italic (VerdanaPro-BoldItalic.ttf)

name

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 16/17

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

NID 16 'Verdana Pro' + 'Space' + NID 17 'Bold Italic' = NID 1 'Verdana Pro' + 'Space' + NID 2 'Bold Italic'.

Pass

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 17

Reserved word used in Typographic Subfamily Name NID17 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 17 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Roman'

Pass

Verdana Pro Bold Italic (VerdanaPro-BoldItalic.ttf)

name

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 17

Should be camel case Typographic Subfamily Name NID17

NID 17: OK. No camel case required.

Pass

Verdana Pro Bold Italic (VerdanaPro-BoldItalic.ttf)

name

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 17

Check style extentions Typographic Subfamily Name NID17

NID 17 does not contain any of the following beginnings: 'Dm, Ultra, Extra, Semi, Demi, X, Ex, Xtra, Sm'

Pass

Verdana Pro Bold Italic (VerdanaPro-BoldItalic.ttf)

name/OS/2

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 17

Width Names Typographic Subfamily Name NID17

OS/2 usWidthClass seems to be correct. Cannot find any specific width name in the name:
'Bold Italic'

Error

Verdana Pro Bold Italic (VerdanaPro-BoldItalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 0 (1, 0, 0, 0)

Mac NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
Mac NID 0 is '© 2017 Microsoft Corporation. All Rights Reserved.'
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Pass

Verdana Pro Bold Italic (VerdanaPro-BoldItalic.ttf)

Mac NID 6

Pass

Verdana Pro Bold Italic (VerdanaPro-BoldItalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'VerdanaPro-BoldItalic', Everything looks good.

Pass

Verdana Pro Bold Italic (VerdanaPro-BoldItalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'VerdanaPro-BoldItalic', Everything looks good.

Pass

name

Mac NID 6

Reserved word used in PostScript Name NID6 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 6 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

Mac NID 7

Test Trademark

Current trademark is:
'Verdana is a trademark of the Microsoft group of companies.'
but what do think about this
'Verdana is a trademark of Fontsmith Ltd and may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'

Pass

Verdana Pro Bold Italic (VerdanaPro-BoldItalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8

Manufactur (NID 8) should be Monotype IP

OK: Mac NID 8 is 'Monotype Imaging Inc.'.

Error

Verdana Pro Bold Italic (VerdanaPro-BoldItalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8/13

License text if Manufactur (NID 8) is one of these 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited'

Please verify against job spec.
Mac NID 13 is:
Microsoft supplied font. You may use this font to create, display, and print content as permitted by the license terms or terms of use, of the Microsoft product, service, or content in which this font was included. You may only (i) embed this font in content as permitted by the embedding restrictions included in this font; and (ii) temporarily download this font to a printer or other output device to help print content. Any other use is prohibited.
but should be:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Pass

Verdana Pro Bold Italic (VerdanaPro-BoldItalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 16/17

Mac NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

NID 16 'Verdana Pro' + 'Space' + NID 17 'Bold Italic' = NID 1 'Verdana Pro' + 'Space' + NID 2 'Bold Italic'.

Pass

Verdana Pro Bold Italic (VerdanaPro-BoldItalic.ttf)

name

NID 10 (3, 1, 1033, 10)

'Description' has invalid entry.

Name table entry contains line break, but shouldn't:
'The Verdana™ typeface family was created specifically to address the challenges of on-screen display. Designed by world renowned type designer Matthew Carter, and hand-tuned by leading hinting expert, Tom Rickner, these sans serif fonts are unique examples of type designed for reading on a computer screen.[ ][
][ ][
]Verdana Pro is a major update to the Verdana family. Developed by The Font Bureau, Monotype Imaging and Matthew Carter, Verdana Pro extends the original family of four fonts to 20 fonts in total. The Verdana Pro and Verdana Pro Condensed families each contain 10 fonts: Light, Regular, Semibold, Bold and Black (each with matching italic styles). These enhanced fonts provide typographic flexibility for use in both on screen and in print.[ ][
][ ][
]Verdana Pro includes a variety of advanced typographic features including true small capitals, ligatures, fractions, old style figures, lining tabular figures and lining proportional figures. An OpenType-savvy application is required to access these typographic features. Verdana Pro contains over 800 glyphs with extensive language support including Codepage 1252 Latin 1, Codepage 1250 Latin 2 Eastern Europe, Codepage 1253 Greek, Codepage 1251 Cyrillic, Codepage 1254 Turkish, Codepage 1257 Baltic.'

Error

Verdana Pro Bold Italic (VerdanaPro-BoldItalic.ttf)

name

MS NID 8/13

License text if Manufactur (NID 8) is one of these 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited'

Please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
Microsoft supplied font. You may use this font to create, display, and print content as permitted by the license terms or terms of use, of the Microsoft product, service, or content in which this font was included. You may only (i) embed this font in content as permitted by the embedding restrictions included in this font; and (ii) temporarily download this font to a printer or other output device to help print content. Any other use is prohibited.
but should be:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Pass

Verdana Pro Bold Italic (VerdanaPro-BoldItalic.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Pass

Mac and MS NID 0

MS is: '© 2017 Microsoft Corporation. All Rights Reserved.'

Verdana Pro Bold Italic (VerdanaPro-BoldItalic.ttf)

name

Mac and MS NID 1

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are the same.
Mac is: 'Verdana Pro'
MS is: 'Verdana Pro'

Pass

Verdana Pro Bold Italic (VerdanaPro-BoldItalic.ttf)

name

Mac and MS NID 2

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are the same.
Mac is: 'Bold Italic'
MS is: 'Bold Italic'

Error

Verdana Pro Bold Italic (VerdanaPro-BoldItalic.ttf)

name

Mac and MS NID 3

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are different.
Mac [1, 0, 0] is: 'Verdana Pro Bold Italic'
MS [3, 1, 1033] is: 'Microsoft - Verdana Pro Bold Italic'

Pass

Verdana Pro Bold Italic (VerdanaPro-BoldItalic.ttf)

name

Mac and MS NID 4

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are the same.
Mac is: 'Verdana Pro Bold Italic'
MS is: 'Verdana Pro Bold Italic'

Pass

Verdana Pro Bold Italic (VerdanaPro-BoldItalic.ttf)

name

Mac and MS NID 13

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are the same.
Mac is: 'Microsoft supplied font. You may use this font to create, display, and print content as permitted by the license terms or terms of use, of the Microsoft product, service, or content in which this font was included. You may only (i) embed this font in content as permitted by the embedding restrictions included in this font; and (ii) temporarily download this font to a printer or other output device to help print content. Any other use is prohibited.'
MS is: 'Microsoft supplied font. You may use this font to create, display, and print content as permitted by the license terms or terms of use, of the Microsoft product, service, or content in which this font was included. You may only (i) embed this font in content as permitted by the embedding restrictions included in this font; and (ii) temporarily download this font to a printer or other output device to help print content. Any other use is prohibited.'

Pass

Verdana Pro Bold Italic (VerdanaPro-BoldItalic.ttf)

name

Mac and MS NID 10

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are different.
Mac [1, 0, 0] is: 'No entry.'
MS [3, 1, 1033] is: 'The Verdana™ typeface family was created specifically to address the challenges of on-screen display. Designed by world renowned type designer Matthew Carter, and hand-tuned by leading hinting expert, Tom Rickner, these sans serif fonts are unique examples of type designed for reading on a computer screen.

Verdana Pro is a major update to the Verdana family. Developed by The Font Bureau, Monotype Imaging and Matthew Carter, Verdana Pro extends the original family of four fonts to 20 fonts in total. The Verdana Pro and Verdana Pro Condensed families each contain 10 fonts: Light, Regular, Semibold, Bold and Black (each with matching italic styles). These enhanced fonts provide typographic flexibility for use in both on screen and in print.

Verdana Pro includes a variety of advanced typographic features including true small capitals, ligatures, fractions, old style figures, lining tabular figures and lining proportional figures. An OpenType-savvy application is required to access these typographic features. Verdana Pro contains over 800 glyphs with extensive language support including Codepage 1252 Latin 1, Codepage 1250 Latin 2 Eastern Europe, Codepage 1253 Greek, Codepage 1251 Cyrillic, Codepage 1254 Turkish, Codepage 1257 Baltic.'

Pass

Verdana Pro Bold Italic (VerdanaPro-BoldItalic.ttf)

name

Family Name is present.

Verdana Pro Black Regular (VerdanaPro-Black.ttf)

name

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 0 (0, 3, 0, 0)

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 0 is '© 2017 Microsoft Corporation. All Rights Reserved.'
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Pass

Verdana Pro Black Regular (VerdanaPro-Black.ttf)

name

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 6

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '16'
'VerdanaPro-Black'

Pass

Verdana Pro Black Regular (VerdanaPro-Black.ttf)

name

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 6

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'VerdanaPro-Black', Everything looks good.

Pass

Verdana Pro Black Regular (VerdanaPro-Black.ttf)

name

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 6

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'VerdanaPro-Black', Everything looks good.

Pass

Verdana Pro Black Regular (VerdanaPro-Black.ttf)

name

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 7

Test Trademark

Current trademark is:
'Verdana is a trademark of the Microsoft group of companies.'
but what do think about this
'Verdana is a trademark of Fontsmith Ltd and may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'

(This is automatically generated and might be wrong. Must be confirmed by legal)

Info

Verdana Pro Black Regular (VerdanaPro-Black.ttf)

name

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 8/13

License text.

There is a license text but no manufactur. Please verify agains spec.
The license text is:
Microsoft supplied font. You may use this font to create, display, and print content as permitted by the license terms or terms of use, of the Microsoft product, service, or content in which this font was included. You may only (i) embed this font in content as permitted by the embedding restrictions included in this font; and (ii) temporarily download this font to a printer or other output device to help print content. Any other use is prohibited.

Pass

Verdana Pro Black Regular (VerdanaPro-Black.ttf)

name

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 16/17

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

NID 16 'Verdana Pro' + 'Space' + NID 17 'Black' = NID 1 'Verdana Pro Black'.

Pass

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 17

Check style extentions Typographic Subfamily Name NID17

NID 17 does not contain any of the following beginnings: 'Dm, Ultra, Extra, Semi, Demi, X, Ex, Xtra, Sm'

Pass

Verdana Pro Black Regular (VerdanaPro-Black.ttf)

name/OS/2

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 17

Width Names Typographic Subfamily Name NID17

OS/2 usWidthClass seems to be correct. Cannot find any specific width name in the name:
'Black'

Error

Verdana Pro Black Regular (VerdanaPro-Black.ttf)

name

Mac NID 0 (1, 0, 0, 0)

Mac NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
Mac NID 0 is '© 2017 Microsoft Corporation. All Rights Reserved.'
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Pass

'Verdana Pro Black'

Verdana Pro Black Regular (VerdanaPro-Black.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '16'
'VerdanaPro-Black'

Pass

Verdana Pro Black Regular (VerdanaPro-Black.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'VerdanaPro-Black', Everything looks good.

Pass

Verdana Pro Black Regular (VerdanaPro-Black.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'VerdanaPro-Black', Everything looks good.

Pass

Verdana Pro Black Regular (VerdanaPro-Black.ttf)

name

Mac NID 7

Test Trademark

Current trademark is:
'Verdana is a trademark of the Microsoft group of companies.'
but what do think about this
'Verdana is a trademark of Fontsmith Ltd and may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'

(This is automatically generated and might be wrong. Must be confirmed by legal)

Pass

Verdana Pro Black Regular (VerdanaPro-Black.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8

Manufactur (NID 8) should be Monotype IP

OK: Mac NID 8 is 'Monotype Imaging Inc.'.

Error

Verdana Pro Black Regular (VerdanaPro-Black.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8/13

License text if Manufactur (NID 8) is one of these 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited'

Please verify against job spec.
Mac NID 13 is:
Microsoft supplied font. You may use this font to create, display, and print content as permitted by the license terms or terms of use, of the Microsoft product, service, or content in which this font was included. You may only (i) embed this font in content as permitted by the embedding restrictions included in this font; and (ii) temporarily download this font to a printer or other output device to help print content. Any other use is prohibited.
but should be:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Pass

Verdana Pro Black Regular (VerdanaPro-Black.ttf)

name

Mac NID 16/17

Mac NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

NID 16 'Verdana Pro' + 'Space' + NID 17 'Black' = NID 1 'Verdana Pro Black'.

Pass

Info

Verdana Pro Black Regular (VerdanaPro-Black.ttf)

name

NID 10 (3, 1, 1033, 10)

'Description' has invalid entry.

Name table entry contains line break, but shouldn't:
'The Verdana™ typeface family was created specifically to address the challenges of on-screen display. Designed by world renowned type designer Matthew Carter, and hand-tuned by leading hinting expert, Tom Rickner, these sans serif fonts are unique examples of type designed for reading on a computer screen.[ ][
][ ][
]Verdana Pro is a major update to the Verdana family. Developed by The Font Bureau, Monotype Imaging and Matthew Carter, Verdana Pro extends the original family of four fonts to 20 fonts in total. The Verdana Pro and Verdana Pro Condensed families each contain 10 fonts: Light, Regular, Semibold, Bold and Black (each with matching italic styles). These enhanced fonts provide typographic flexibility for use in both on screen and in print.[ ][
][ ][
]Verdana Pro includes a variety of advanced typographic features including true small capitals, ligatures, fractions, old style figures, lining tabular figures and lining proportional figures. An OpenType-savvy application is required to access these typographic features. Verdana Pro contains over 800 glyphs with extensive language support including Codepage 1252 Latin 1, Codepage 1250 Latin 2 Eastern Europe, Codepage 1253 Greek, Codepage 1251 Cyrillic, Codepage 1254 Turkish, Codepage 1257 Baltic.'

Error

Verdana Pro Black Regular (VerdanaPro-Black.ttf)

name

MS NID 8/13

License text if Manufactur (NID 8) is one of these 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited'

Please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
Microsoft supplied font. You may use this font to create, display, and print content as permitted by the license terms or terms of use, of the Microsoft product, service, or content in which this font was included. You may only (i) embed this font in content as permitted by the embedding restrictions included in this font; and (ii) temporarily download this font to a printer or other output device to help print content. Any other use is prohibited.
but should be:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Pass

Verdana Pro Black Regular (VerdanaPro-Black.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Pass

name

Mac and MS NID 0

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are the same.
Mac is: '© 2017 Microsoft Corporation. All Rights Reserved.'
MS is: '© 2017 Microsoft Corporation. All Rights Reserved.'

Pass

MS is: 'Verdana Pro Black'

Verdana Pro Black Regular (VerdanaPro-Black.ttf)

name

Mac and MS NID 13

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are the same.
Mac is: 'Microsoft supplied font. You may use this font to create, display, and print content as permitted by the license terms or terms of use, of the Microsoft product, service, or content in which this font was included. You may only (i) embed this font in content as permitted by the embedding restrictions included in this font; and (ii) temporarily download this font to a printer or other output device to help print content. Any other use is prohibited.'
MS is: 'Microsoft supplied font. You may use this font to create, display, and print content as permitted by the license terms or terms of use, of the Microsoft product, service, or content in which this font was included. You may only (i) embed this font in content as permitted by the embedding restrictions included in this font; and (ii) temporarily download this font to a printer or other output device to help print content. Any other use is prohibited.'

Pass

Verdana Pro Black Regular (VerdanaPro-Black.ttf)

name

Mac and MS NID 16

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are the same.
Mac is: 'Verdana Pro'
MS is: 'Verdana Pro'

Pass

Verdana Pro Black Regular (VerdanaPro-Black.ttf)

name

Mac and MS NID 17

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are the same.
Mac is: 'Black'
MS is: 'Black'

Error

Verdana Pro Black Regular (VerdanaPro-Black.ttf)

name

Mac and MS NID 10

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are different.
Mac [1, 0, 0] is: 'No entry.'
MS [3, 1, 1033] is: 'The Verdana™ typeface family was created specifically to address the challenges of on-screen display. Designed by world renowned type designer Matthew Carter, and hand-tuned by leading hinting expert, Tom Rickner, these sans serif fonts are unique examples of type designed for reading on a computer screen.

Verdana Pro is a major update to the Verdana family. Developed by The Font Bureau, Monotype Imaging and Matthew Carter, Verdana Pro extends the original family of four fonts to 20 fonts in total. The Verdana Pro and Verdana Pro Condensed families each contain 10 fonts: Light, Regular, Semibold, Bold and Black (each with matching italic styles). These enhanced fonts provide typographic flexibility for use in both on screen and in print.

Verdana Pro includes a variety of advanced typographic features including true small capitals, ligatures, fractions, old style figures, lining tabular figures and lining proportional figures. An OpenType-savvy application is required to access these typographic features. Verdana Pro contains over 800 glyphs with extensive language support including Codepage 1252 Latin 1, Codepage 1250 Latin 2 Eastern Europe, Codepage 1253 Greek, Codepage 1251 Cyrillic, Codepage 1254 Turkish, Codepage 1257 Baltic.'

Pass

Verdana Pro Black Italic (VerdanaPro-BlackItalic.ttf)

name

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 6

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'VerdanaPro-BlackItalic', Everything looks good.

Pass

name

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 6

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'VerdanaPro-BlackItalic', Everything looks good.

Pass

name

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 7

Test Trademark

Current trademark is:
'Verdana is a trademark of the Microsoft group of companies.'
but what do think about this
'Verdana is a trademark of Fontsmith Ltd and may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'

(This is automatically generated and might be wrong. Must be confirmed by legal)

Info

Verdana Pro Black Italic (VerdanaPro-BlackItalic.ttf)

name

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 8/13

License text.

There is a license text but no manufactur. Please verify agains spec.
The license text is:
Microsoft supplied font. You may use this font to create, display, and print content as permitted by the license terms or terms of use, of the Microsoft product, service, or content in which this font was included. You may only (i) embed this font in content as permitted by the embedding restrictions included in this font; and (ii) temporarily download this font to a printer or other output device to help print content. Any other use is prohibited.

Pass

Verdana Pro Black Italic (VerdanaPro-BlackItalic.ttf)

name

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 16/17

!! BOGUS PLATFORM !! NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

NID 16 'Verdana Pro' + 'Space' + NID 17 'Black Italic' = NID 1 'Verdana Pro Black' + 'Space' + NID 2 'Italic'.

Pass

name

Mac NID 1

Check style extentions Family Name NID1

NID 1 does not contain any of the following beginnings: 'Dm, Ultra, Extra, Semi, Demi, X, Ex, Xtra, Sm'

Pass

Verdana Pro Black Italic (VerdanaPro-BlackItalic.ttf)

name/OS/2

Mac NID 1

Width Names Family Name NID1

OS/2 usWidthClass seems to be correct. Cannot find any specific width name in the name:
'Verdana Pro Black'

Pass

Verdana Pro Black Italic (VerdanaPro-BlackItalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 4

Mac NID 4 = NID 1 and NID 2.

NID 4 'Verdana Pro Black Italic' = NID 1 'Verdana Pro Black' + 'space' + NID 2 'Italic'

Verdana Pro Black Italic (VerdanaPro-BlackItalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '22'
'VerdanaPro-BlackItalic'

Pass

Verdana Pro Black Italic (VerdanaPro-BlackItalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'VerdanaPro-BlackItalic', Everything looks good.

Pass

Verdana Pro Black Italic (VerdanaPro-BlackItalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'VerdanaPro-BlackItalic', Everything looks good.

Pass

Verdana Pro Black Italic (VerdanaPro-BlackItalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Reserved word used in PostScript Name NID6 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 6 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

NID 6 contains correct campel case: 'BlackItalic'

Verdana Pro Black Italic (VerdanaPro-BlackItalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 7

Test Trademark

Current trademark is:
'Verdana is a trademark of the Microsoft group of companies.'
but what do think about this
'Verdana is a trademark of Fontsmith Ltd and may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'

(This is automatically generated and might be wrong. Must be confirmed by legal)

Pass

Verdana Pro Black Italic (VerdanaPro-BlackItalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8

Manufactur (NID 8) should be Monotype IP

OK: Mac NID 8 is 'Monotype Imaging Inc.'.

Error

Verdana Pro Black Italic (VerdanaPro-BlackItalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8/13

License text if Manufactur (NID 8) is one of these 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited'

Please verify against job spec.
Mac NID 13 is:
Microsoft supplied font. You may use this font to create, display, and print content as permitted by the license terms or terms of use, of the Microsoft product, service, or content in which this font was included. You may only (i) embed this font in content as permitted by the embedding restrictions included in this font; and (ii) temporarily download this font to a printer or other output device to help print content. Any other use is prohibited.
but should be:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Pass

Verdana Pro Black Italic (VerdanaPro-BlackItalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 16/17

Mac NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

NID 16 'Verdana Pro' + 'Space' + NID 17 'Black Italic' = NID 1 'Verdana Pro Black' + 'Space' + NID 2 'Italic'.

Pass

Verdana Pro Black Italic (VerdanaPro-BlackItalic.ttf)

name

MS NID 0 (3, 1, 1033, 0)

MS NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
MS NID 0 is '© 2017 Microsoft Corporation. All Rights Reserved.'
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Verdana Pro Black Italic (VerdanaPro-BlackItalic.ttf)

name

NID 10 (3, 1, 1033, 10)

'Description' has invalid entry.

Name table entry contains line break, but shouldn't:
'The Verdana™ typeface family was created specifically to address the challenges of on-screen display. Designed by world renowned type designer Matthew Carter, and hand-tuned by leading hinting expert, Tom Rickner, these sans serif fonts are unique examples of type designed for reading on a computer screen.[ ][
][ ][
]Verdana Pro is a major update to the Verdana family. Developed by The Font Bureau, Monotype Imaging and Matthew Carter, Verdana Pro extends the original family of four fonts to 20 fonts in total. The Verdana Pro and Verdana Pro Condensed families each contain 10 fonts: Light, Regular, Semibold, Bold and Black (each with matching italic styles). These enhanced fonts provide typographic flexibility for use in both on screen and in print.[ ][
][ ][
]Verdana Pro includes a variety of advanced typographic features including true small capitals, ligatures, fractions, old style figures, lining tabular figures and lining proportional figures. An OpenType-savvy application is required to access these typographic features. Verdana Pro contains over 800 glyphs with extensive language support including Codepage 1252 Latin 1, Codepage 1250 Latin 2 Eastern Europe, Codepage 1253 Greek, Codepage 1251 Cyrillic, Codepage 1254 Turkish, Codepage 1257 Baltic.'

Error

Verdana Pro Black Italic (VerdanaPro-BlackItalic.ttf)

name

MS NID 8/13

License text if Manufactur (NID 8) is one of these 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited'

Please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
Microsoft supplied font. You may use this font to create, display, and print content as permitted by the license terms or terms of use, of the Microsoft product, service, or content in which this font was included. You may only (i) embed this font in content as permitted by the embedding restrictions included in this font; and (ii) temporarily download this font to a printer or other output device to help print content. Any other use is prohibited.
but should be:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Pass

name

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Mac is: '© 2017 Microsoft Corporation. All Rights Reserved.'
MS is: '© 2017 Microsoft Corporation. All Rights Reserved.'

You may use this font to create, display, and print content as permitted by the license terms or terms of use, of the Microsoft product, service, or content in which this font was included. You may use this font to create, display, and print content as permitted by the license terms or terms of use, of the Microsoft product, service, or content in which this font was included. You may only (i) embed this font in content as permitted by the embedding restrictions included in this font; and (ii) temporarily download this font to a printer or other output device to help print content. Verdana Pro Black Italic (VerdanaPro-BlackItalic.ttf)

name

Mac and MS NID 10

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are different.
Mac [1, 0, 0] is: 'No entry.'
MS [3, 1, 1033] is: 'The Verdana™ typeface family was created specifically to address the challenges of on-screen display. Designed by world renowned type designer Matthew Carter, and hand-tuned by leading hinting expert, Tom Rickner, these sans serif fonts are unique examples of type designed for reading on a computer screen.

Verdana Pro is a major update to the Verdana family. Developed by The Font Bureau, Monotype Imaging and Matthew Carter, Verdana Pro extends the original family of four fonts to 20 fonts in total. The Verdana Pro and Verdana Pro Condensed families each contain 10 fonts: Light, Regular, Semibold, Bold and Black (each with matching italic styles). These enhanced fonts provide typographic flexibility for use in both on screen and in print.

Verdana Pro includes a variety of advanced typographic features including true small capitals, ligatures, fractions, old style figures, lining tabular figures and lining proportional figures. An OpenType-savvy application is required to access these typographic features. Verdana Pro contains over 800 glyphs with extensive language support including Codepage 1252 Latin 1, Codepage 1250 Latin 2 Eastern Europe, Codepage 1253 Greek, Codepage 1251 Cyrillic, Codepage 1254 Turkish, Codepage 1257 Baltic.'

Pass

Verdana Pro Black Italic (VerdanaPro-BlackItalic.ttf)

name

Unicode NID 1 (Unicode/2.0, BMP only)

Necessary name table entry according Monotype: 'Unicode NID 1, Family Name' (Unicode/2.0, BMP only)

Family Name is present.

Pass

Subfamily Name is present.

Underline Position and Thickness

Underline Position and Thickness

Pass

Verdana Pro Light Regular (VerdanaPro-Light.ttf)

post

underline position and thickness

underlinePosition should be a negative and underlineThickness not 0 or negative.

underlinePosition is '-154'.
underlineThicknes is '102'.

Pass

Verdana Pro Light Italic (VerdanaPro-LightItalic.ttf)

underline position and thickness

underlinePosition is '-154'.
underlineThicknes is '102'.

Kerning (kern Table and GPOS Kerning)

Kerning (kern Table and GPOS Kerning)

Pass

Verdana Pro Light Regular (VerdanaPro-Light.ttf)

GPOS

kern

Simple check if kern feature in GPOS table.

The font has GPOS kerning.

Info

Verdana Pro Light Regular (VerdanaPro-Light.ttf)

kern

-/-

Check if 'kern' table in font.

Font has no 'kern' table. Please verify if font requires kern table or if only GPOS kerning should be in font.

Info

Verdana Pro Light Regular (VerdanaPro-Light.ttf)

kern/GPOS

kern

'kern' table and 'GPOS' kerning.

Font has GPOS kerning and no 'kern' table.
Verify with the spec or PM what is required.

Pass

Vertical Metrics

Vertical Metrics

Error

Verdana Pro Light Regular (VerdanaPro-Light.ttf)

OS/2 and head

sTypeAsc/Desc and unitsPerEm

The result of sTypoAscender – sTypoDescender should match or exceed the unitsPerEm value.

The result of sTypoAscender – sTypoDescender (1989) should match or exceed the unitsPerEm value (2048), but it is smaller. Consciously?

Info

Verdana Pro Light Regular (VerdanaPro-Light.ttf)

hhea

Vertical Metrics

Pull hhea Metrics

hhea.ascent: 2059
hhea.descent: -430
hhea.lineGap: 0

Info

Verdana Pro Light Regular (VerdanaPro-Light.ttf)

OS/2

Vertical Metrics

Pull OS/2 sTypo Metrics

OS2.sTypoAscender: 1566
OS2.sTypoDescender: -423
OS2.sTypoLineGap: 202

Info

Verdana Pro Light Regular (VerdanaPro-Light.ttf)

OS/2

Vertical Metrics

Pull OS/2 usWin Metrics

OS2.usWinAscent: 2059
OS2.usWinDescent: 430

Info

Verdana Pro Light Regular (VerdanaPro-Light.ttf)

OS/2

xAvgCharWidth

Get 'OS/2' xAvgCharWidth.

xAvgCharWidth = 1172.

Info

Verdana Pro Light Regular (VerdanaPro-Light.ttf)

hhea

advanceWidthMax

Get advanceWidthMax.

advanceWidthMax = 2829.

Info

Verdana Pro Light Regular (VerdanaPro-Light.ttf)

hhea

xMin, yMin, xMax, yMax

Get xMin, yMin, xMax, yMax.

xMin: -1016
yMin: -621
xMax: 2665
yMax: 2120

Pass

Verdana Pro Light Regular (VerdanaPro-Light.ttf)

OS/2

sTypoAscender

Vertical Metrics 'sTypoAscender' shouldn't be negative.

sTypoAscender = '1566'.

Pass

Verdana Pro Light Regular (VerdanaPro-Light.ttf)

OS/2

sTypoDescender

Vertical Metrics 'sTypoDescender' should be negative.

sTypoDescender = '-423'.

Pass

Verdana Pro Light Regular (VerdanaPro-Light.ttf)

OS/2

sTypoLineGap

Vertical Metrics 'sTypoLineGap' shouldn't be negative.

sTypoLineGap = '202'.

Pass

Verdana Pro Light Regular (VerdanaPro-Light.ttf)

OS/2

usWinAscent

Vertical Metrics 'usWinAscent' shouldn't be negative.

usWinAscent = '2059'.

Pass

Verdana Pro Light Regular (VerdanaPro-Light.ttf)

OS/2

usWinDescent

Error

Verdana Pro Black Italic (VerdanaPro-BlackItalic.ttf)

OS/2 and head

sTypeAsc/Desc and unitsPerEm

The result of sTypoAscender – sTypoDescender should match or exceed the unitsPerEm value.

The result of sTypoAscender – sTypoDescender (1989) should match or exceed the unitsPerEm value (2048), but it is smaller. Consciously?

Info

Verdana Pro Bold Italic (VerdanaPro-BoldItalic.ttf)

gasp

Default

Pull gasp table Default.

Grid-fit = True, Do gray = True, Symmetric grid-fit = True, Symmetric smoothing = True

Pass

Verdana Pro Bold Italic (VerdanaPro-BoldItalic.ttf)

gasp

Default

Check gasp table Default.

gasp table default is:
Grid-fit = True, Do gray = True, Symmetric grid-fit = True, Symmetric smoothing = True
and should be:
Grid-fit = True, Do gray = True, Symmetric grid-fit = True, Symmetric smoothing = True

Info

Verdana Pro Bold Italic (VerdanaPro-BoldItalic.ttf)

gasp

subtable

Pull gasp subtable: '8'

Do gray = True, Symmetric smoothing = True

Pass

Verdana Pro Bold Italic (VerdanaPro-BoldItalic.ttf)

head

lowestRecPPEM

Monotype standard for lowestRecPPEM is '9'.

lowestRecPPEM is '9', but should be '9'

Pass

Verdana Pro Bold Italic (VerdanaPro-BoldItalic.ttf)

gasp

subtable

gasp subtable value should be one less than lowestRecPPEM (head table).

gasp subtable is '8' and should be '8'.
(head table lowestRecPPEM is '9')

Pass

PostScript names

PostScript names

Info

Verdana Pro Light Regular (VerdanaPro-Light.ttf)

post

PostScript names

Postscript names should not be longer then 29 characters. May cause issues in PDF.

Font has no PostScript names.

Info

Verdana Pro Light Italic (VerdanaPro-LightItalic.ttf)

Font has no PostScript names.
